block.p: Erika deBoesche Ryan, a daughter of Fabienne and Robert Ryan of Orangeburg, N.Y., is to be married today to Thomas Gunther Oelkers, a son of Catherine and Thomas M. Oelkers of Maspeth, Queens. Msgr. William J. Belford will perform the ceremony at St. Catharine's Roman Catholic Church in Blauvelt, N.Y.
The couple graduated from St. John's University, where they met.

Erika deBoesche Ryan, a daughter of Fabienne and Robert Ryan of Orangeburg, N.Y., is to be married today to Thomas Gunther Oelkers, a son of Catherine and Thomas M. Oelkers of Maspeth, Queens. Msgr. William J. Belford will perform the ceremony at St. Catharine's Roman Catholic Church in Blauvelt, N.Y.
The couple graduated from St. John's University, where they met.

The bride, 25, will continue to use her name professionally. She is a sales associate at Salomon Smith Barney in Manhattan. Her father owns Graphic Color, a printing and publishing company in Teaneck, N.J. Her mother is the director of surgical services for the Our Lady of Mercy Centers in the Bronx.

The bridegroom, 26, is a police officer working in Manhattan's Midtown North Precinct. His mother is a sales representative for Globe Fasteners, a manufacturer in Maspeth. His father, a retired New York City firefighter, was with Engine Company 238 in Greenpoint, Brooklyn.
